Koga Shuko/Hades/Serpentor/Unitron/Ramhorn/Anubis/Ramhorn/Amobeous:



(These are memories, not posts, though some of these images are false, and 
all in the character's mind, he self destruced, not shot to death, thank you)

The quivering robot's feet clanged against the metal surface of the Alliance 
base's floor.  Slipping, he slammed into a wall, though his scaly armor 
helped to protect him.  Raising his plasma launcher, he fired a powerful 
plasma blast striking Perndabot, the Alliance member exploding, his pieces 
slamming into the walls.  A bolt hit him in the leg, the scaly robot sliding 
forward as he fell, slowly getting up, a kick from Zardus sent him crashing 
the ground.  Looking up, the last thing he saw were the evil faces of the 
Alliance, especially a laughing like mad Nemesis Enforcer, each of the seven 
other robots pulling their triggers, the lasers and plasma bolts tearing 
through his armor easily, everything going black. 

---------------- 

Koga Shuko laughed, seeing the screen on the device reading: 100%, the robot 
fully regenerated.  
"Now that-"

Interrupted, Serpentor, cloned, screamed, waking up, smashing through the 
device, fallin to his knees, slamming his fists on the ground.

Shuko looked to Anubis and Hades, the two robots approaching Serpentor.  
Serpentor jumped forward, tackling Anubis to the ground.  Hades sent a swift 
kick, sending Serpentor to his back, aiming his laser rifle at the somewhat 
confused robot's face.

"W...w...what the slag is going on!?" Serpentor growled pulling out his sword 
with a cobra head-shaped hilt, pointing it at Hades' chest.

"I, am Koga Shuko.  Evidently you died somehow near the Alliance base.  I've 
cloned you.  You are mine now.  You will have the honor of conquering the 
universe alongside myself and Set."

"What?!  The last thing I remember...being captured by the Alliance.  Then 
they attacked.  I self-destructed to try and take some of them out.  Then I'm 
here.  What exactly are you doing on Earth..."

"Well, errr..."

"I am called Serpentor."

"Serpentor, I and Set are here to eliminate all the factions on this planet.  
And take the energon.  Then conquer the universe in our time.  Hell Beast is 
dead (a lie), that fool Megatron stole his body and has gone crazy (a lie), 
who you were obviously serving since you are Predacon and the Alliance killed 
you, is old news.  Either join with the new Predacon forces here, or join 
your old team.  I will let you decide."

"Hmmm...mass murder...Koga Shuko, I remember that name!  You could buy 
planets like these with only a 10th of your fortune!  Mass murder 
though...I'm in!"

Koga Shuko and Serpentor shook hands.  "Good, good!  Hades and Anubis, update 
our friend here with everything we know, and show him around.  Give him 
quarters as well."

Hades and Anubis nodded, walking away, Serpentor following.

Koga Shuko was about to talk to Unitron, when recieving BH's com-link.  <Yes, 
I told you to come here and get it.  Stay there.  If autoguns aim at you, 
don't worry.  Merely a precaution for my personal safety.  My assistant will 
bring you the 68 kilos (150 pounds, 30 cubes) of energon cubes> he replied, 
ending the transmission.  

Unitron had already left, going down below, lifting the crate thta had been 
filled, walking off steadily towards BH and his comrade.

===================

Aboard a craft of Maximal origin heading for Past Earth, an explosion went 
off in the engines, a bomb destroying them.
"We're going down, Bacterium!" Amobeous yelled, slamming forward into the 
controls, the ship plunging down towards Earth.

=================

Ramhorn sighed, ignoring Prowl's transmission.  "Just because he's ordering, 
doesn't mean he's in charge.  Liono will probably come back, and everything 
goes back to the Pit.  Not for me!" Ramhorn yelled, already at the edge of 
what will be known as Florida.
"Slag!  Dang river.  I better eat before I swim across."
